reviewText: I always enjoy this movie. I've seen it a million times. It's a movie you have to pay attention to. I just love the actors and actresses. If you care about foreign affairs, you will enjoy this movie. If you don't know about foreign affairs, It will help you to understand it a little bit. It's a true story and that makes it more interesting. George Clooney, Matt Damon, Alexander Siddig, and Jeffrey Wright are superb!  Each line means something, so you can't get popcorn without pausing. I hope you enjoy it.
